products.title: DIRA – Design Research Insight Assistant
products.description: DIRA (Design Research Insight Assistant) is the ultimate side-panel utility for UI/UX Designers, Product Managers, and Frontend Developers. Stop inspecting elements one by one—DIRA deconstructs the design DNA of any website in a single click. Turn the web into your pattern library.

products.title: Tab Atlas
products.description: Tab Atlas transforms your chaotic browser into an organized, “human-readable map” of your digital workspaces. This intelligent Chrome Extension automatically names your windows (e.g., “Project Alpha,” “Japan Trip,” “React Docs”) based on your active tabs and provides a powerful side panel to manage everything with ease.

products.title: SEO & Accessibility Helper
products.description: Boost your website’s ranking and user experience with the all-in-one SEO & Accessibility Helper. Get an instant on-page SEO analysis, accessibility checks, and Core Web Vitals performance tracking directly in your side panel.

products.title: NoteApply AI
products.description: NoteApply AI is a privacy-first research companion that turns passive reading into active knowledge gathering. Capture insights, dictate voice notes with AI refinement, and generate actionable summaries using Local Ollama, OpenAI, or Gemini.

products.title: gac – Git Auto Commit
products.description: An open source AI-powered Git co-pilot that writes high-quality commit messages, generates changelogs, and even automates full semantic releases.

products.title: Prompt Optimizer
products.description: A Chrome extension that helps users write better prompts for AI models like ChatGPT and Google Gemini.

products.title: Pink Panda Dark
products.description: A cozy dark VS Code theme providing a blend of dark pastel colors contrasted with soft pinks.

products.title: Duplicate Link Finder
products.description: A simple yet powerful tool designed to help you streamline your Google Docs™.
